Mr. Speaker, I rise in strong support of H.R. 972, the Sloan Canyon  Conservation and Lateral Pipeline Act, introduced by Representative  Titus.

Southern Nevada is one of the fastest growing regions in the country,  and with growth comes increased demand for critical resources like  drinking water.
